1.text: Measure out 2 cups (240 g) of powdered sugar into a mixing bowl.

2.text: Stir 1⁄4  c (59 mL) of milk into the powdered sugar using a whisk.

3.text: Mix in 1⁄4  tsp (1.2 mL) of vanilla extract and a pinch of salt.

4.text: Dip your donuts into the glaze and put them on a rack until the glaze hardens.

6.text: Heat chocolate chips, butter, and corn syrup in the bowl over medium heat.

7.text: Stir the ingredients often until they are melted and thoroughly combined.

8.text: Stir in 1⁄4  tsp (1.2 mL) of vanilla extract.

9.text: Dip the tops of your donuts into the glaze and place them on a rack.

10.text: Blend 1 cup (170 g) of brown sugar in a blender until it becomes powdery.

11.text: Combine the sugar with unsweetened soy milk and vanilla extract in a bowl.

12.text: Use this glaze to top vegan donuts or other vegan desserts.
